entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
